name: Magical Harvest - Demo
description:
In this farming sim you can evolve crops and breed animals into magical variations and use magic to ease the hard farm work. Date citizens regardless of gender or race, explore the world, craft potions, cook, fish, mine, customize your farm and change the land into a magical paradise.

This version is the early-development demo.

The demo provides 5 hours of gameplay (depending on your playstyle). You can play through the whole spring season as often as you want. One season -> circa 5 hours.
The demo gives you a first insight into the following aspects of the game:
- farming
- fishing
- exploring
- crafting 

Main game - keyfeatures
  • Live in a farm in a magical world and evolve crops to higher forms, breed magical animals, go fishing, craft potions and more!
  • Use magic to ease the hard farm life.
  • Customize your farm with the advanced decoration system!
  • Play as one of 5 Races and customize your character based on their style!
  • Fall in love with one of the 10 dateable residents and start a family - if you want!
  • Honor the gods as not to fall from grace!
